org.foxlabs.validation.Validator.ContextBuilder

  • Packages that use Validator.ContextBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.foxlabs.validation  

    • Uses of Validator.ContextBuilder in org.foxlabs.validation

      Methods in org.foxlabs.validation that return Validator.ContextBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Validator.ContextBuilder Validator.newContext()
      Creates a new context builder.
      Validator.ContextBuilder Validator.newContext(ValidationContext<?> parent)
      Creates a new context builder for cascade validation.
      Validator.ContextBuilder Validator.ContextBuilder.setFailFast(boolean fail)
      Sets flag that determines if validation should fail on the first violation.
      Validator.ContextBuilder Validator.ContextBuilder.setLocalizedConvert(boolean localized)
      Sets flag that determines if converters should take locale into account.
      Validator.ContextBuilder Validator.ContextBuilder.setMessageLocale(Locale locale)
      Sets locale to be used for error messages and formatting numbers, dates, etc.
      Validator.ContextBuilder Validator.ContextBuilder.setPropertyFilter(PropertyFilter filter)
      Sets filter to be used for property filtering.
      Validator.ContextBuilder Validator.ContextBuilder.setValidatingGroups(String... groups)
      Sets array of constraint groups to be validated.
      Constructors in org.foxlabs.validation with parameters of type Validator.ContextBuilder 
      Constructor and Description
      Context(Validator.ContextBuilder builder)
      Constructs a new Context using parameters from the specified context builder.
